content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #89191 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
This is a pretty old regression, and not a severe diagnostics issue. Maybe P-low?
I don't understand what you think is the bug; the error says "use occurs due to use in closure" right in the middle
That's the "bug": it says "use occurs due to use in closure", which sounds somewhat confusing and redundant. It'd be better if it said something like "used here in closure".
I can change this to C-enhancement if you'd prefer.
Yeah, I don't think this is a bug/regression. Seems fine to improve the wording though :)
I do think it is a regression, since the old error was clearer IMO, but I agree that this is not really a "bug" :)
I marked it as P-low, since some other diagnostic papercuts with similar magnitude to this one have been marked that way.
